'''Genshin Impact × Cadillac''' is a collaborative effort between ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' creators [[miHoYo]] and {{w|Cadillac}}.

==Collaborations==
To date, there have been '''2''' collaborations between ''Genshin Impact'' and Cadillac.
<!--
===Cadillac CT4===
{{Zh|尘世巡礼 特别的开始}}

===Cadillac CT4 and XT4===
[[File:Genshin x Cadillac CT4 XT4.png|thumb]]
'''The Wind Rises and the Lightning Surges: A Special Journey''' ''(unofficial name)'' {{Lang|zh=风起雷涌 特别的旅途}} is their second collaboration and features two new limited-edition themed vehicles. Buyers would also receive themed merchandise and in-game items.

;Rewards
* Genshin Impact × Cadillac suitcase <small>(Beidou- or Kazuha-themed)</small>
* Genshin Impact × Cadillac headrest <small>(Beidou- or Kazuha-themed)</small>
* Genshin Impact × Cadillac vacuum flask <small>(Beidou- or Kazuha-themed)</small>
* Genshin Impact × Cadillac notebook
* Genshin Impact × Cadillac folding umbrella <small>(Beidou- or Kazuha-themed)</small>
* Genshin Impact × Cadillac 1:18 model car <small>(Beidou- or Kazuha-themed)</small>
* {{Item|Primogem|x=20,000}}
* {{Item|Mora|x=100,000}}
* {{Item|Virtuous Share Bundle|x=10}}
* {{Item|Exotic Share Bundle|x=10}}
* {{Item|Celebration: Lenticular Clouds}}
* {{Item|A Seat of Sophisticated Luxury}}
